name: Blonde Barry Body Spray with Blackberry + Blood Orange
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Fruity Florals.Key Notes:Blackcurrant Bud, Blackberry, Sensual Musk,.Fragrance Description:Succulent blackcurrant buds and juicy blackberry, blood orange, and nectarine are wrapped with sensual musks and mineral woods that delight and entice the senses. Alcohol-free, water-based formula..About the Bottle:These body sprays feature a neutral-colored aluminum can. Aluminum is a lightweight material that is easier and more energy efficient to recycle than glass and convenient to bring anywhere..About the Fragrance:I wanted to play with the juicy, succulence of blackberry and elevate its innate sensuality. I blended blackberry and musk for a blackberry-musk-infused effect, and then used mineral woods, like driftwood and cedar, for contrast and textured sensuality.—Pascal Gaurin, Perfumer
ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate,.Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance Composition, Methyl Dihydrojasmonate, 1-Propanol, 2-[1-(3,3-Dimethylcyclohexyl)Ethoxy]-2-Methyl-, Propanoate, Ethylene Brassylate, Octahydro Tetramethyl Naphthalenyl Ethanone, Dipropylene Glycol, Ambrox, Linalyl Acetate, Oxacycloheptadec-10-En-2-One, Methylcyclopentadecenone, 2,6 Dimethyl 7 Octen 2 Ol, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Vetiveria Zizanioides (Vetiver) Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, 3-Ethylhexahydro-3h-Benzofuran-2-One, Methyl Dihydroxy-Dimethylbenzoate, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil,4h-Ideno[4,5-D]-1,3-Dioxole, 3a,5,6,7,8,8b-Hexahydro-2,2,6,6,7,8,8-Heptamethyl-, Lavandin Abs, Olibanum Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Ethyl 2,2-Dimethylhydrocinnamal And Ethyl, 2,2-Dimethylhydrocinnamal, Petitgrain Bigrade, Petitgrain Mandarinier, Redberry Co2 Extract (Schinus Terebenthifolius), Methyl Benzyl Acetate/Alpha, 3-Hexenol/Cis-3...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product however I feel no better than a cash cow! I ordered this after the Canada Post made everyone aware of the strike and yet they sent it and 4 other of my orders out via Canada Post. Very poor customer service!  WAITING FOR MY ORDERS!!!They left me hanging!!! Still

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray is everything. As a millennial who lived on body spray in her teens I am loving its glow up. This is smells so good and I really love layering it with some warmer scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's perfect and I wish I bought this at the beginning of summer! I don't get any nectarine. This isn't overwhelmingly fruity at all. I love the musk at the base because it's not an overwhelming patchouli bomb or sandalwood heavy. Truely one of the best body sprays I ever purchased and I'm not mad about the price anymore. Very well blended and I hope Henry Rose makes this a permanent scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite scent for the spring/summer! It smells like a sultry blackberry. This is a perfect “date-night” scent. The only downside is the scent has little lasting stay. Please make this into a perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is heaven! A juicy musk that dries down to the sweetest, softest cedar. I’m in love. My only qualm is that the scent is so light that it fades before anyone else has the chance to experience it too. I held my arm up to my husband for him to sniff, only 30 mins after the initial spray, and he smelled nothing. I hope they turn this one into a stronger fragrance instead of a body spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing!! However the scent doesn't last. Please make into a perfume!!

reviews.review_title: Smells like a Sexy expensive black Berry ❤️
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! Especially because this is a clean mist that I can just spray with out worrying - between this and the boys of summer. This one has MUCH longer staying power. I love the berry smell; pairs well with other scents to layer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I’m the first non-incentivized review! Is this overpriced? Well, yes. Does this smell amazing? Yes, and it does smell expensive. There’s nowhere to smell this so it was a blind buy, and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for my honest review it’s body spray it’s new fragrance composed of aunique alcohol free and water based formula it’s blonde Barry body spray is adroble I love it it leaves you refreshing it’s made from juicy blackberry blood orange and nectarine wrapped with sensual musks and mineral wood it’s come in good packaging recyclables I love it and smell too much good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body mist is delightfully light and has a pleasant fruity scent, making it perfect for young ladies! I appreciate that it's not overly sweet, which can sometimes give me a headache. The subtle hint of berry notes adds a touch of sophistication to the fragrance, making it smell expensive and elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying this body spray, and it is truly a remarkable addition to my fragrance collection. It is not just about the scent; it's also about the aesthetics, and the bottle looks elegant on any vanity. This scent strikes a perfect balance between freshness and warmth. The body spray contains clean and sustainable ingredients. The longevity of Blonde Barry is impressive for a body spray, as it lingers throughout the day without being overpowering. It is a unisex fragrance that can be enjoyed by anyone, regardless of gender, making it a versatile choice for sharing with a partner or loved one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose is a great option for anyone looking for a cleaner fragrance option. Henry Rose Blonde Barry Body Spray is an alcohol free and water based body spray with a fruity floral scent. I sprayed it on me and I was in heaven. I love the scent and felt good wearing it because I knew it was a cleaner fragrance option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this body spray! This was the ifrst product I ever tried from Henry Rose and I am very impressed! The bottle is larger than anticipated, which is always a plus and the scent is DIVINE! I am obsessed with it! I love that it stays scented on me for a long time and that the scent is not overpowering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This new Henry rose body spray has changed my life. A new fragrance format composed of a unique, alcohol-free, water-based formula. This is my first time trying it and I love the scent so much. It’s so refreshing and lingers for a very good time. It’s very luxurious as well. You need to give this a try.

reviews.review_title: Great Scent & Design, But Could Last Longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Blonde Barry body spray has a very pleasant fruity floral fragrance that isn’t overly sweet. Although it is a unisex scent, I do feel that it leans feminine, but not so much so that I would find it out of place if a male friend or acquaintance was wearing it. The aluminum bottle has a clean and elegant design that reflects its price point. However, I was disappointed in how long it lasted. While it had more staying power in my hair, it faded more quickly than I would have expected for the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this is a scent I’ve walked by someone and wondered what they’re wearing. It’s the perfect floral scent without being too sweet and sugary smelling. I’m definitely repurchasing this after it runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray smells really good. It's a light and very pleasant scent for me. I'm loving using it in my everyday life. I apply it in the morning right after my shower. and I have received a lot of compliments on how I smell. I'm in love. The smell is a very good fruity floral. I love recommending this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite body spray of all time!! Oh my gosh is this just delicious! The scent is such a fun day time vibe. This is the only body spray I’ve ever used where the scent actually lasts all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blonde Barry is the perfect balance between fruity and floral. It smells so incredible but just know that since this is a water-based body mist, it doesn't last the longest. Nonetheless, for the size, it's definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The spray itself is very wet being as it’s water based. I’m not really too fond of that. It would be worth it though if I could actually smell the fragrance. I can barely smell anything so to me it’s kind of pointless using unless you spray A LOT. Unfortunately I wouldn’t buy another.

reviews.review_title: Sooo light and fruity and nice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am extremely picky about fragrances and OMG I LOVE THIS!!!! It’s fruity with the blackberry but it’s not too much or too sweet. it has a light musk that helps the fragrance maintain a more mature scent and last longer. The bottle is large and sprays nicely. I really wish I had this in a body wash, a lotion, a body oil and an EDP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great everyday body spray, huge win that it’s alcohol free but I love the notes of fruity feels within it without smelling cheap. This has been my new go to! Easy for day to night as well, very enjoyable scent. Also love the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Henry Rose Blonde Barry body spray took me by surprise. I was excited to try it but scared I wasn't going to like it. After the first spray(on a shirt) I wasn't a fan, I got alot of rose scent, The second time I sprayed it on my skin and it was so much better!!! It didn't bother me at all and wasn't as strong, that made me love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Henry Rose Blonde Barry body spray smells so amazing! Make sure to shake the bottle before spraying your body! My husband hates my fragrances, but he says this smell is good! I think it smells light and beautiful! I have already gotten compliments while I have been wearing it. The scent lasts for a long time for it being a body spray. The packaging is so chic! I definitely recommend this body spray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the delightful berry scent of this body mist. It's not too strong or overwhelming, just the perfect balance. The scent gently lingers on me for a long time, which I really appreciate. Plus, the bottle looks beautiful. I love everything about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blonde Barry by Henry Rose is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. Its main accords are fruity, sweet, musky, woody, floral and powdery.  I am impressed with the packaging. The scent is sweet and floral. It is the whole body spray. It stayed on me for max 3 hours. It is summer /spring scent. I like it but a bit expensive it is $75 for a body spray.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful fragrance for floral and musk lovers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance sprays a lot out at a time, which I really like because it gets a larger area at once. It’s not an overpowering scent and it’s more like a body spray so I like to spray both arms. It has a floral/musky scent that is just so beautiful. I only wish it lasted a little longer. It disappears on me after about an hour or so. But it’s beautiful while it lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent! It's a fruity floral with a hint of musk to it but it smells so sophisticated and luxurious. The bottle is sleek, the spray does have a lot of product that comes out so I only do 2 pumps. I only wished it lasted longer on me especially for the price.

Love this water based clean body spray I got the scent blonde Barry is a fruity floral I pick up on the citrus and juicy fruits. The packaging is beautifully minimalistic and is recyclable. Since it doesn’t have drying alcohol it’s perfect to use as a hair perfume.

I tried Henry Rose Blond Barry Body Spray. Downside is that it does not lost long and cost is on the higher end. Also the scent itself appeared too strong for me, however my Mom loved it and would recommend at lower price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blonde Barry definitely starts out very berry, and it is my favorite fragrance of the three body sprays recently launched. For the first couple hours, I can't smell much else beyond the berrylicious notes, but it's quite summery and fruity. Blonde Barry is a blackberry-musk-infused scent, contrasted with mineral woods like driftwood and cedar. The sweetness of the blackcurrant and blackberries in this scent reminded me of being at a farmers market on an early summer day. Light, and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful minimalist and sleek packaging! First time trying this brand and love how the scents transform and dry down. Initially appears strong but fell in love with the mix of floral, sweet and musky dry down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: STUNNING scent! Henry Rose has done it AGAIN and this body spray is out of this world amazing! The bottle is luxe and the scent is so lovely! An amazing floral but sophisticated and i cannot asked for more! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this Henry Rose Blonde Barry Body Spray smells Amazing. It’s a sweet fragrance that is long lasting and the Packaging is minimal and chic. I keep smelling my self when i wear and fall in love with the scent over and over again. I like that it’s an alcohol free fragrance too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the scent of this beautiful spray. It’s very sweet, but not overly so. I love the musky undertones it leaves on my skin.  It lasts a while, though not as long as I would like it to. A beautiful scent for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this body spray! Gave Henry Rose another try after not being impressed by one of their perfumes, but this body spray immediately attracted me. I love the floral fruity scent, with a very slight undertone of musk. Not too strong, scent lasted me the whole day even during some slight sprinkles, and it’s a scent I want to smell constantly. It’s a warm floral scent that lasts a long time without being too overpowering.

This body mist is well packed in a nice cardboard tube which makes it a great gift. It smells familiar but nicely. The scent is long lasting and strong. The mist is fine and even. I really like it on my body and hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body scent is absolutely divine! It's a perfect blend with multiple notes and lingers on the skin for a remarkably long time. I adore wearing it daily because it's not overpowering; instead, it exudes a fresh and delightful aroma

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently discovered Henry Rose products and I have been impressed.  The Blonde Barry body spray is fruity,  sweet and fresh to me.  It doesn't feel as heavy as a perfume; It's refreshing and great for everyday use. And I love that it's alcohol-free.

reviews.review_title: Like the scent but not my style
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray has a long lasting scent. It has floral and fruity scent. The scent lasts all day without the need to reapply. It definitely feel this is a fancy body spray. I like the scent but get a head ache with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is nice, vanilla, a little musky and spicy.  I like scents like this and have a few like this. It's very strong at first, but settles out. I feel like it lasts all day.  The bottle is very clean looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This seriously smells so delicious and juicy that whenever I wear it I know I’m going to be reviving compliments. I Love that it’s alcohol free so I even spray it on my hair. I honestly can’t wait to try the other scents. New favorite line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice body mist. I really love how it smells and also the packaging is really good. It feels very luxurious. I am going to try more from this.. This is my new fall scent and I am addicted to itDivyam

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is delicious. Reminds of vacation at the beach. I love the paper packaging that I’m able to recycle! Henry rose is a great brand for fragrances as they are clean ingredients. It also makes a great gift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this perfume by henry rose! i got it in the scent blonde barry! i love the smell and got so many compliments wearing it. the packaging is beautiful and i love how it’s made from water also! very unique

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blonde Barry body spray by Henry Rose is my new favorite fragrance . It is deliciously complex and layered with sweet fruity and mysterious musky goodness. Considering it is a body spray the scent lasts longer than I thought it would. Really nice recycled packaging. Impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so beautiful I love it! It’s a really warm scent with notes of floral and even though it’s a body spray it lasted way longer than I would have expected! I think it’s my next go to scent for sure highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Henry Rose Blonde Barry body spray has to be one of my favorite new scents I’ve discovered lately. The fresh and vibrant blackberry and black currant are the first thing that hits and then the musk blends in beautifully. Such a lovely scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray from Henry Rose is so sweet and floral I absolutely adore it! Perfect for any sunny day! It's super light and refreshing,  I would highly recommend if you love florals. I get so many compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The way I am immediately obsessed with this brand! I was able to try both Blonde Barry and Mustang Sally and while they are both so different I love them both equally! This one has more of a masculine scent to it but still manages to be clean and floral. It’s just a lovely combination of notes and it’s long lasting too! It lingers throughout the day and I honestly can’t get enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray smells divine if you’d like a deep jammy fruity rose fragrance! It smells sweet and a little dark and mysterious! Sensitive body spray I only noticed it lasting 3 to 4 hours. The quality is really nice though and smells sexy & sophisticated to me. This was gifted for review. I am only giving four out of five stars though, because the price for a body spray is a bit expensive in my opinion as that’s the price of some of my favorite fragrances that obviously last a lot longer / have a higher fragrance oil concentration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's my first time trying this brand and I'm so impressed! It's a body spray but the scent lasts all day for me. I spray it liberally, about 4-6 sprays. The scent is really nice, almost nostalgic. It's sweet but musky. Now I want to try out their other scents!

reviews.review_title: Love it in every way possible!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using Henry Rose. Blonde Barry is truly refreshing in every possible way - a lovely fresh scent that's gives citrus and berry vibes that comes in the most eco friendly packaging and container. The scent itself smells very natural and not too overpowering, that said the staying power is not too high. The spray comes in an aluminum bottle and the out packaging is completely recycled cardboard with no plastic whatsoever. I'm seriously in awe with this product and I highly recommend for a free spirited, eco conscious soul!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this body spray! It has the perfect floral scent, so it is more feminine fragrance. The bottle is a good size and nice and sleek. The nozzle dispenses nicely I only need one spray. It does have great lasting power as well for a body spray. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is very refreshing and bright enough to wear in the daytime. It feels pretty breezy and feminine to me with it's notes. You do get a bit of fruit notes in it as well. The bottle itself is beautiful too and in great quality as it's not made with a plastic bottle. I love the way it arrived. My first time ever trying the brand and it all feels like high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this fragrance dries down on me. It is initially heavy on the patchouli note, but after dry down there is a perfect combination of the sweet blackberry and the smokiness of the other scents. I love how this scent can be worn on both genders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved trying this body spray. It smells very nice and fresh on the skin. It has a floral type of scent with notes of black currant bud, blackberry, sensual musk, and nectarine. It’s also cool how this is alcohol free! I’m loving the scent and it’s my go to body spray right now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose's Blonde Barry body spray smells divine. The first thing I smell when sprayed is a burst of berries and powder. I smell a bit of wood, earthiness, and a nature scent to it with some patchouli and musk after the initial spray.  When it dries down, it becomes a summer fruity -powdery smell. The scent lasts longer than the average body spray but it will need to be resprayed for the same strength as when sprayed around the 3-hour mark, as it becomes a bit faint. This scent does have fruit and berry scent without being overly sweet and childish. There is some spice, powder, and cedar to balance it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells very expensive. It's not too sweet, but it's fruity and a bit musky. I personally think its more of a feminine fragrance. Be sure to shake it before spraying! I'm not used to doing that with fragrances but I noticed the instructions said to shake well. The lasting power on this is not great. I think the smell fades away after a couple hours. The aluminum packaging is sleek, so I do like that. I think it's kinda pricey given the lasting power but the scent is very nice. So if you love it,  it may be worth it to you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A luxurious body spray with an elevated, luxurious scent! I really enjoy this and it's lasting power. It's subtle on the skin, almost like your essence since it doesn't have as much throw as a perfume - which I prefer so it's more natural and worn in feeling. It's not nauseating and feels fresh and floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Henry Rose Blonde Barry Body Spray is a soft, floral scent with subtle fruity notes. This is a unisex fragrance that leans slightly feminine, but is balanced with musky notes. It’s a very fresh fragrance that wears nicely throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose Blonde Barry Body Spray   I absolutely love the aluminum non-aerosol spray can that this comes in! The bottle is so simple, elegant, pretty and just feels nice in my hand. I love the way it sprays. I didn’t fall in love with this scent the first time but there is something about the way it comes out of the spray bottle and feels on that made me give it a chance. It is a nice refreshing scent, but I can’t put my finger on what It is that is unlike what I normally wear.  I think maybe it’s more fruity than what I normally prefer. I tend to lean more towards the Musk and Patchouli top notes. I like the Blonde Barry and I think it’s a good fit for day wear for me. I am looking forward to trying the other scents from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this body spray from Henry Rose in exchange for this post.This body spray smells amazing. It is different from what I would typically wear, but I love it. It smells fruity with a hint of floral & musk. Perfect for anytime of the day. I can’t wait to try other scents from this brand. Such a great value for the size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I am surprised at the size of this body spray I was expecting it to be a lot smaller. I love the fruity mixture that the scent has. The smell lasted all day for me and I got a lot of compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this scent! It’s my first Henry rose product and I’m hooked. The packaging is AMAZING and the scent is fruity but subtle yet you’re still able to smell the orange. I’ve gotten compliments every time I put it on. The perfect summer into fall scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my new go to fragrance. It has a beautiful fresh citrus scent but also has lovely musky notes to tone down the sweetness creating the perfect balance that I can only describe as juicy, grounded and feminine. With that being said I also think this is a great unisex scent and is perfect for anyone looking for a subtle yet fresh scent. I love how long this lingers and find myself not needing to reapply. I was surprised when mine arrived at how big it was and this bottle will definitely last me a long time. Every time I’ve worn this I’ve received compliments and cannot overstate what a must try this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I was able to try out this perfume brand because I cannot stop smelling my perfume! The scent is so subtle but carries throughout the day as if I sprayed it fresh. It's that perfect scent that I feel I can take from day to night and I'm excited to try to mix it with other scents to see how that works together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received it this morning but couldn't wait, I had to open the box and try it right away!! It made me exclaim OH!! WOO. The scent is juicy and watery, with a hint of light orange. What makes it captivating is the blend of musk and woody notes, giving it an overall sensual and alluring vibe. It's also a higher-end body spray. I love the design in the aluminum can, it feels like the fragrance isn't oxidized so it always smells like the first time, not to mention that it can be recycled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second Henry Rose product and omg I'm completely in love with this scent! It's such a nice fruity scent which I absolutely love! Also the packaging is so nice and you get a lot of product! The scent does stay for some time but the strongest power fades quite quickly. But again this is a body spray not a perfume do this is normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried Henry Rose but I was so excited to get the rose blonde barry body spray. The smell lasts a while and is very subtle and not to strong. There’s a musk to it and you can smell the blackberry and the blood orange. People have stopped me and asked me what I’m wearing. Can’t wait to keep using it.

Very elegant packaging and bottle design. The fruit note is stronger than the musk/wood notes. It's overall a nice fruity fragrance that's not overly sweet. It stays on for a few hours but fades fairly quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love fruity notes in my body sprays and this spray has them all. The packaging is very secure and amazing. I have used it a few times and the scent lasts all day long. I must recommend this to everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A high quality fruity scent. It smells expensive and uplifting. I love blood orange notes and it is a dominant facet of this hair and body mist. It contains no alcohol and is water based, so I feel safe applying it on my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice smelling body spray. I really like that’s a light smell and not to strong. Has a nice fruity light smell that’s nice for both men and women to use. Overall it’s a nice body spray that I would use a few times a week to get my moneys worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body spray smells better than I expected! It smells like fresh and musky vanilla. It gives off a vibe of an expensive fragrance. I think this would work for both men and women. I would really recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Keyword: Sensual! I’m in love with this scent, it smells so good. Warm and succulent. I literally adore the berry fruity note that has a lovely musky dry down and the patchouli heart. It stays on the skin for hours and on the clothes for days, even if it is a body spray. I’m very pleased with the quality. I love the fact the packaging is made with recyclable aluminum can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This isn't your typical cheap smelling body spray, this stuff makes you smell expensive. It's lightly fruity but lighter and without being sickly sweet. I've gotten so many compliments about this. Best part is it lasts longer than any other body spray I've ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I wasn’t sure if I wanted to order those because it’s a body spray, which makes me think of like a splash or very Porten deodorant but it’s actually amazing it’s like just saw perfume that lingers. The scent is amazing and very musky, but also fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This looks and smells like such high quality that I forget it’s a body spray. It smells divine and lasts on the skin for a really long time. I love it for every day wear because it’s not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed by the smell of this fragrance! It smells so fresh and I love the fruit element. A lot of fruit fragrances can lean young but this doesn’t whatsoever. Henry Rose is definitely a new favorite of mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: recently tried a Henry Rose body spray, and I must say I’m impressed. The scent is lovely and not overpowering, making it perfect for everyday use. It also lasts surprisingly well throughout the day, giving me a refreshing boost of fragrance. What I appreciate most is the brand’s commitment to clean and sustainable ingredients. Knowing that it’s free from harmful chemicals and environmentally friendly adds to my satisfaction.
